greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Harmonic means associated with A090945.
comment: A perfect number N=2^(p-1)*M(p) (=A000396), {with associated Mersenne prime M(p)=2^p -1 (=A000668)}, has harmonic mean N*tau(N)/sigma(N) = p (=A000043).
formula: a(n)= m*tau(m)/sigma(m), where m=A090945(n), tau=A000005 and sigma=A000203
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, ab = sigma(n)/n; hm = numdiv(n)/ab; if ((type(hm) == "t_INT") && (ab != 2), print1(hm, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 26 2013
results.author: _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jan 07 2005
ext: a(1)=1 as well as a(29)=47 inserted and more terms added by _Michel Marcus_, Oct 26 2013
